title: LTTE FIGHTERS WHO FLED THEIR MILITARY DEFEAT TRAINING MAOISTS
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana reporting from Los Angeles The recent statement that some cadres of  Sri Lanka’s crushed Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam (LTTE) have joined Maoists of the Sothern Indian state of Karnataka is a process that continued to happen without any break with the fall of the movement back in 2009…
